title: Microsoft Azure Fundamentals | Microsoft
description: Demonstrated foundational knowledge of cloud concepts and Microsoft Azure, including its architectural components, services (compute, networking, storage), and security, governance, and administration features. Prepared to pursue deeper technical specializations within the Azure platform.

title: Scrum Master Professional Certificate - SMPC | CertiProf
description: Scrum Master Professional Certificate holders have an understanding of Scrum theory, practices, and rules, both within the Scrum Team and the organization with the ability to apply them to all industries. They will be able to demonstrate their knowledge and comprehension of Agile mindset and values, continuous improvement, team leadership, performance, and coaching the team members in self-management and cross-functionality.

title: Scrum Foundation Professional Certificate | CertiProf
description: Scrum Foundation Professional Certification holders have developed entry-level skills in Scrum that endorse their fundamental knowledge in this framework. They have demonstrated an understanding of the empirical Scrum pillars of transparency, inspection, and adaptation. Their primary focus is on the work of Sprint to make the best possible progress toward these goals.

title: Android Certified Professional | Android ATC
description: Android Certified Professional certification demonstrating comprehensive knowledge of Android development, including application architecture, UI/UX design, data management, and mobile development best practices. Validates expertise in building robust, performant Android applications using industry standards and modern development practices.
